Note: Nostr is a protocol, so it is capable of offering much more than a Twitter alternative.

name: Google's privacy policy
description: Owned by google and built upon the open-source Chromium project (also Google-owned). It comes with many privacy-invasive features, it is connected to your Google account most times. It is under Google's privacy policy which is known to be very bad. Google is willing to enforce the Manifest v3 which is outright harmful to privacy efforts.
